references.paper_title: The Cityscapes dataset for semantic urban scene understanding
references.reason: It is a foundational dataset for semantic segmentation, frequently used as a benchmark and thus highly influential in the field.

references.paper_title: Fully convolutional networks for semantic segmentation
references.reason: This paper introduced the influential Fully Convolutional Network (FCN) architecture, a cornerstone of modern semantic segmentation methods.

references.paper_title: DeepLab: Semantic image segmentation with deep convolutional nets, atrous convolution, and fully connected crfs
references.reason: DeepLab significantly advanced semantic segmentation with its use of atrous convolutions and conditional random fields (CRFs), improving accuracy and handling varying scales.

references.paper_title: Multispectral video semantic segmentation: A benchmark dataset and baseline
references.reason: This paper introduced the MVSeg dataset, a crucial resource for the research on multispectral video semantic segmentation (MVSS), which is the main topic of the current paper.

references.paper_title: Mean teachers are better role models: Weight-averaged consistency targets improve semi-supervised deep learning results
references.reason: This paper introduced the "Mean Teacher" approach, a highly influential method in semi-supervised learning that is relevant to the semi-supervised methods explored in the current paper.
